post.title: Raspberry PI﻿ into a simple Bluetooth audio receiver
post.excerpt: Raspberry PI﻿ into a simple Bluetooth audio receiver
post.content:
This tutorial will turn your Raspberry PI into a simple Bluetooth audio receiver, which plays music through connected speakers.

Audio source (i.e. smartphone)

                v
 (((  Wireless Bluetooth Channel  )))

                v
           Raspberry PI
                |
                v
       USB Audio Interface
                |
                v
             Speakers

The Bluetooth profile which does the magic is called A2DP.
